desc: A gemstone filled with good wishes. Extremely valuable when sold, but also a unique synthesis material.

dictionary.lore: Aspiration stones are enchanted gemstones of an unknown element which bear immense beauty. It is rumored that they are synthesized and blessed by the gods themselves, eventually scattered by them across the lands. They are of valuable worth and many are willing to pay a high price to get one, believing that possessing the item brings great luck. Craftsmen are known to synthesize them into powerful artifacts with the right ingredients.

name: Aspiration Stone
